nounusedchunks.backupprompt.removeuninha: Removes all chunks that were never inhabited by a player. While this may reduce the world size by a lot, keep in mind that this may also remove chunks you might need, without actually having visited them. For example, this may end up removing chunks modified by another mod or a tool or a program. Please back up your world before doing this, and make sure the chunks got removed properly.
nounusedchunks.clothconfig.required: [%s] The mod config GUI requires the Cloth Config API mod.
nounusedchunks.clothconfig.title: No Unused Chunks config
nounusedchunks.clothconfig.general.enabl: Whether the mod is enabled or not. When enabled, newly generated chunks that have been untouched will not be marked as 'needs saving'.
nounusedchunks.clothconfig.general.unfla: Defines the chance a newly generated chunk will not be marked as 'needs saving'. Lower chance means more newly generated chunks will immediately get saved like they would normally while saving performance at the cost of drive storage, while higher values will make the mod unmark more newly generated chunks as 'needs saving' and thus saving more storage at the cost of performance.
